title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5005.5 - Valid subscription entry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5005.5 - Valid subscription entry

State Regulations

To be a valid entry, a subscription must meet the
following requirements: (a) Official record. To be
eligible to win a prize, an application, including the subscriberidentification
information, and the game character selections must be entered into the
commission's subscription file to create the official record of subscription
entry. (b) Confirmation. A confirmation shall be issued by the commission
to the subscriber confirming a subscription entry is valid and has been
processed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

5005.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
